Post.title: CI
Post._content:
# CI
## CI
![CI](/images/ci/flow.png)

>   
> https://www.zhihu.com/question/23444990/answer/26995938  
>   
> 

> /  
  



> 

> 


--------------------


[](http://www.ruanyifeng.com/blog/2015/09/continuous-integration.html)

## 
- [Travis CI](https://travis-ci.org/) 
- [AppVeyou](https://www.appveyor.com/) windows
- [Gitlab CI](https://about.gitlab.com/gitlab-ci/) GitlabCI
- [Jenkins](https://jenkins.io/index.html) jre

## 
- [vue-fullstack](https://github.com/erguotou520/vue-fullstack)
  `vue``travis`  
  ```yaml
  language: node_js
  node_js:
    - "6"
  before_install:
    - git config --global push.default matching
    - git config --global user.name "erguotou"
    - git config --global user.email "erguotou525@gmail.com"
  install:
    - npm install -g vue-cli
    - npm install
    - node test/index.js
  script:
    - cd ../test-fullstack
    - npm install
    - npm run lint
    - npm run build
  cache:
    directories:
      - node_modules
      - ../test-fullstack/node_modules
      - $(npm config get prefix)/vue-cli
  ```
    
  *TODO:pushgithubheroku*
- [electron-ssr](https://github.com/erguotou520/electron-ssr) `ShadowsocksR`pc`travis``appveyor`  
  ```yaml
  # travis
  osx_image: xcode7.3

  sudo: required
  dist: trusty

  language: c

  matrix:
    include:
      - os: osx
      - os: linux
        env: CC=clang CXX=clang++ npm_config_clang=1
        compiler: clang

  addons:
    apt:
      sources:
        - ubuntu-toolchain-r-test
      packages:
        - icnsutils
        - graphicsmagick
        - xz-utils
        - rpm

  cache:
    directories:
    - node_modules
    - app/node_modules
    - $HOME/.electron
    - $HOME/.cache

  before_install:
    - mkdir -p /tmp/git-lfs && curl -L https://github.com/github/git-lfs/releases/download/v1.2.1/git-lfs-$([ "$TRAVIS_OS_NAME" == "linux" ] && echo "linux" || echo "darwin")-amd64-1.2.1.tar.gz | tar -xz -C /tmp/git-lfs --strip-components 1 && /tmp/git-lfs/git-lfs pull

  install:
  - nvm install 6
  - npm install electron-builder
  - npm install
  - npm prune

  script:
  - npm run build

  branches:
    only:
      - master
  ```

  ```yaml
  version: 1.0.{build}

  platform:
    - x64

  cache:
    - node_modules
    - app\node_modules
    - '%APPDATA%\npm-cache'
    - '%USERPROFILE%\.electron'

  branches:
    only:
    - master

  init:
    - git config --global core.autocrlf input

  install:
    - ps: Install-Product node 6 x64
    - git reset --hard HEAD
    - npm install npm -g
    - npm install electron-builder
    - npm install
    - npm prune

  build_script:
    - node --version
    - npm --version
    - npm run build
  ```
  `travis`LinuxMac`appveyor`WindowsAppGihub Releasepush->->
- [vio-frontend]() T2CloudVIOGitlab CIpoc
  ```yaml
  stages:
    - install_deps
    - lint
    # - test
    - build
    - deploy_poc
  # 
  install_deps:
    stage: install_deps
    script:
      - npm install --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org
  lint:
    stage: lint
    script:
      - npm run lint
  # 
  # test:
  #   stage: test
  #   only:
  #     - develop
  #     - master
  #   script:
  #     - npm run test
  # 
  build:
    stage: build
    only:
      - develop
      - master
    script:
      - npm run build
  # 
  deploy_test:
    stage: deploy_poc
    only:
      - develop
    script:
      - npm run deploy
  ```

##

Post.title: dokku
Post._content:
# dokku
`dokku`shell`Heroku`PAASdocker`docker driven`

1. `Ubuntu`  
2. `dokku`
  ```bash
  # 0.9.4
  wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dokku/dokku/v0.9.4/bootstrap.sh
  sudo DOKKU_TAG=v0.9.4 bash bootstrap.sh
  ```
  `dokku`  
3. `gogs`[https://dokku.github.io/tutorials/deploying-gogs-to-dokku](https://dokku.github.io/tutorials/deploying-gogs-to-dokku)
  `tag`
  ```bash
  dokku apps:create gogs
  dokku proxy:ports-add gogs http:80:3000
  dokku docker-options:add gogs deploy -p 2222:22
  mkdir -p /var/lib/dokku/data/storage/gogs
  chown -R dokku:dokku /var/lib/dokku/data/storage/gogs
  dokku storage:mount gogs /var/lib/dokku/data/storage/gogs:/data
  dokku plugin:install https://github.com/dokku/dokku-mysql.git mysql
  dokku mysql:create gogs
  dokku mysql:link gogs gogs
  # 
  docker pull gogs/gogs:0.11.4
  docker tag gogs/gogs:0.11.4 dokku/gogs:0.11.4
  dokku tags:deploy gogs 0.11.4
  ```
4. Let's Encrypthttps
  ```bash
  sudo dokku plugin:install https://github.com/dokku/dokku-letsencrypt.git
  dokku config:set --global DOKKU_LETSENCRYPT_EMAIL=erguotou525@gmail.com
  dokku letsencrypt gogs
  dokku letsencrypt:cron-job --add
  ```
  web`gogs``install`mysql`dokku mysql:info gogs``dokku enter gogs``/data/gogs/conf/app.ini`  
5. `drone``drone``server``agent`
  ```bash
  # server
  dokku apps:create drone
  dokku mysql:create drone
  dokku mysql:link drone drone
  # 
  # docker pull drone/drone:latest
  docker pull drone/drone:0.7.3
  docker tag drone/drone:0.7.3 dokku/drone:0.7.3
  # drone
  dokku config:set drone DRONE_OPEN=false DRONE_GOGS_PRIVATE_MODE=true DRONE_DATABASE_DRIVER=mysql DRONE_DATABASE_DATASOURCE='root:password@tcp(1.2.3.4:3306)/drone?parseTime=true' DRONE_HOST=https://drone.erguotou.me DRONE_GOGS=true DRONE_GOGS_URL=https://gogs.erguotou.me DRONE_SECRET=secret DRONE_ADMIN=username,password
  dokku tags:deploy drone 0.7.3
  dokku proxy:ports-add drone http:80:8000
  dokku proxy:ports-remove drone http:443:443 http:8000:8000 http:80:80
  dokku letsencrypt drone
  # agentdocker/ws/broker
  # dokku apps:create drone-agent
  # docker pull drone/agent:latest
  # docker tag drone/agent:latest dokku/drone-agent:latest
  docker run -d -e DRONE_SERVER=wss://drone.erguotou.me/ws/broker -e DRONE_SECRET=password -v /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock --restart=always --name=drone-agent-docker drone/drone:0.7.3 agent
  # agent
  # dokku config:set drone-agent DRONE_SERVER=wss://drone.erguotou.me/ws/broker DRONE_SECRET=secret
  # dokku storage:mount drone-agent /var/run/docker.sock:/var/run/docker.sock
  # dokku tags:deploy drone-agent latest
  ```
7.   
    
  ```bash
  dokku proxy:report app
  dokku proxy:ports-remove app http:80:3000
  dokku proxy:ports-add app http:80:3000
  cat /home/dokku/app/nginx.conf
  dokku ps:stop app
  dokku ps:start app
  ```
8.   
  `dokku`app `dokku apps:create gift``proxy:ports``Let's encrypt`httpsgogs`.drone.yml`[http://docs.drone.io/getting-started/](http://docs.drone.io/getting-started/)  
9.   
  dronedrone agentdokku gitsshssh
  - 1ssh
    ```bash
    ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "dokku-deploy"
    ```
  - `id_rsa.pub`dokku
    ```bash
    # local
    scp ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub root@erguotou.me:/root/deploy.pub
    # server
    dokku ssh-keys:add deploy ./deploy.pub
    ```
  - `ssh`ssh
    ```bash
    cp ~/.ssh/id_rsa* ./ssh
    ```
  - `.drone.yml`build
    ```bash
    - rm -rf ~/.ssh
    - mkdir -p ~/.ssh
    - cp ssh/* ~/.ssh
    - chmod 600 ~/.ssh/id_rsa # 3
    - chmod 644 ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub
    - ssh-keyscan erguotou.me >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts
    - ssh-keyscan 45.77.42.201 >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts
    - echo 'FROM ilyasemenov/dokku-static-site' > dist/Dockerfile # DockerfileDockerfilebuildpacks
    - cd dist
    - git config --global user.email "erguotou525@gmail.com"
    - git config --global user.name "erguotou"
    - git init
    - git add ./ -A
    - git commit -m "auto build"
    - git remote add dokku dokku@erguotou.me:gift
    - git push -u dokku master --force
    ```
    [https://gift.erguotou.me](https://gift.erguotou.me)

    ```bash
    - rm -rf ~/.ssh

    - cp ssh/* ~/.ssh
    - chmod 600 ~/.ssh/id_rsa # 3
    - chmod 644 ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub
    - ssh-keyscan erguotou.me >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts
    - ssh-keyscan 45.77.42.201 >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts
    - echo 'FROM ilyasemenov/dokku-static-site' > dist/Dockerfile # DockerfileDockerfilebuildpacks
    - cd dist
    - git config --global user.email "erguotou525@gmail.com"
    - git config --global user.name "erguotou"
    - git init
    - git add ./ -A
    - git commit -m "auto build"
    - git remote add dokku dokku@erguotou.me:gift
    - git push -u dokku master --force
    ```


3./homelatazu`latazu`nodejsghost
```
cd /home
mkdir latazu
cd latazu
wget http://nodejs.org/dist/v0.10.36/node-v0.10.36.tar.gz
wget http://cdn.diancloud.com/ghost/releases/Ghost-0.5.8-zh.zip
```
4.nodejsmake
```
tar zxvf node-v0.10.36.tar.gz
cd node-v0.10.36
./configure
make && make install
```
5.ghostghost`config.js`
```
cd ../
unzip Ghost-0.5.8-zh.zip -d ghost
cd ghost
cp config.example.js config.js
vi config.js
```

6.
```
npm install --production
```
*npmglibc["libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.14' not found"glibc](http://www.cnblogs.com/gw811/p/3676856.html)glibc*

7.Ghostforever
```
export NODE_ENV=production
npm install -g forever
forever start index.js
```
8.Nginx
```
rpm -Uvh http://nginx.org/packages/centos/6/noarch/RPMS/nginx-release-centos-6-0.el6.ngx.noarch.rpm
yum install nginx
```
nginx`ghost.conf`
```
mkdir /etc/nginx/logs
vi /etc/nginx/conf.d/ghost.conf

server {
	listen       80;
    server_name  www.renshiwo.me renshiwo.me;
	charset      utf-8;
	access_log   logs/ghost.log;
	location / {
		proxy_set_header X-Real-IP $remote_addr;
		proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
		proxy_set_header Host $http_host;
		proxy_set_header X-NginX-Proxy true;

		proxy_pass http://127.0.0.1:2368;
		proxy_redirect off;
	}
}

```
9.nginx
```
service start nginx
chkconfig nginx on
```

OK!~

```bash
)
for repository in ${array[@]}; do
  # usernamepassword
  source=${sourceProtocal}username:password@${sourcePrefix}${repository}
  target=${targetPrefix}${repository}
  tmp=${repository##*/}
  dir=${tmp%.git*}
  git clone ${source}
  cd ${dir}
  git remote add target ${target}
  for remote in `git branch -r | grep -v master `; do
    git checkout --track remotes/$remote
  done
  # git push target '*:*'
  git push target --all
  git push target --tags
  echo 'source '${source}' clone OK.'
  cd ../
done
```

    ```bash
    static routers=192.168.1.1
    static domain_name_servers=114.114.114.114
    ```

	```bash
    sudo apt-get install --fix-broken && sudo apt-get autoremove && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install samba
    ```

	```bash
    sudo apt-get remove samba-common libwbclient0 tdb-tools``sudo apt-get install samba samba-common-bin
    ```

	```bash
    [share]
        comment = Raspberry smb

        browseable = yes
        writeable = yes
    ```

Post._content: > http://www.cnblogs.com/whoamme/p/3494128.html 1. ``` yum -y install pam vsftpd db4 db4-utils ``` 2.ftp ``` useradd -d /home/xxx -s /sbin/nologin vuser_ftp ``` `/home/xxx``/sbin/nologin`shell `vuser_ftp`web`httpd` `www apapche web`~ 3.ftp`login.txt` ``` vi /etc/vsftpd/login.txt user1 pwd1 user2 pwd2 ``` 4.db_load ``` db_load -T -t hash -f /etc/vsftpd/login.txt /etc/vsftpd/vsftpd_login.db ``` `vsftpd_login.db`db_load 5.vsftpd ``` vi /etc/vsftpd/vsftpd.conf anonymous_enable=NO local_enable=YES write_enable=YES local_umask=022 dirmessage_enable=YES xferlog_enable=YES connect_from_port_20=YES xferlog_file=/var/log/vsftpd.log xferlog_std_format=YES listen=YES userlist_enable=YES tcp_wrappers=YES max_per_ip=5 max_clients=100 #### guest_enable=YES # guest_username=vuser_ftp #vuer_ftp # pam_service_name=ftp.vu #ftppamvsftpd user_config_dir=/etc/vsftpd/vsftpd_user_conf # ``` 6.vsftpd.conf `rpm -ql vsftpd` ``` /usr/share/doc/vsftpd-2.2.2/EXAMPLE/VIRTUAL_USERS/vsftpd.pam ``` vsftpd.conf ``` cp /usr/share/doc/vsftpd-2.2.2/EXAMPLE/VIRTUAL_USERS/vsftpd.pam /etc/pam.d/ftp.vu ``` `pam_service_name=ftp.vuftp.vu``/etc/pam.d/ftp.vu` vsftpdpam`pam.d``ftp.vu` `/etc/pam.d/``vsftpd.pam`vsftpdpam`ftp.vu` ``` vi /usr/share/doc/vsftpd-2.2.2/EXAMPLE/VIRTUAL_USERS/vsftpd.pam auth required /lib/security/pam_userdb.so db=/etc/vsftpd/login account required /lib/security/pam_userdb.so db=/etc/vsftpd/login ``` `db=/etc/vsftpd/login``db=/etc/vsftpd/vsftpd_login`.db.db64`/lib/``/lib64/` ``` vi /etc/pam.d/ftp.vu auth required /lib64/security/pam_userdb.so db=/etc/vsftpd/vsftpd_login account required /lib64/security/pam_userdb.so db=/etc/vsftpd/vsftpd_login ``` 7.`vsftpd.conf``user_config_dir=/etc/vsftpd/vsftpd_user_conf` `/etc/vsftpd/vsftpd_user_conf` ``` mkdir /etc/vsftpd/vsftpd_user_conf ``` `/etc/vsftpd/vsftpd_user_conf``login.txt`user1 user2 ``` vi /etc/vsftpd/vsftpd_user_conf/user1 anon_world_readable_only=no #yes write_enable=yes # anon_upload_enable=yes # anon_mkdir_write_enable=yes # anon_other_write_enable=yes # local_root=/home/xxx #FTPxxx ``` user2 8.OKvsftpd ``` service vsftpd restart ```
